name: LIK:Echolocation
description:
labor->information->knowledge:echolocation, or LIK:E for short, is a short visual novel about being unable to see, and echolocation as a primary means of sensing the world.

It's also about the difficulty and vulnerability involved with any act of self-expression — or specifically in trying to know anything beyond your own feelings, whether the world reciprocates them or not. (The difficulty and vulnerability in knowing your own feelings is left as an exercise to the reader.)

Designed using Ren'Py for the Only One of Any Asset visual novel game jam!
